content: the cecilia collection features 5 patterns a cowl a scarf a hat mittens and socks it offers mix and match colourwork motifs for custom projects with floral geometric and figurative designs the designs were made in collaboration with yarn dyer bulbe bizarre with yarn gifted for the samples **yarn ** you will need at least two colours of fingering weight yarn with the following amounts colourwork on leg only total mc 220 250 / 270 / 305 m 240 273 / 295 / 334 yds total cc 54 60 / 67 / 76 m 59 66 / 73 / 83 yds all over colourwork total mc 180 205 / 220 / 250 m 197 224 / 241 / 274 yds total cc 105 117 / 125 / 132 m 115 128 / 137 / 144 yds you can split these requirements to choose multiple colours both for mc and cc using leftovers or mini skeins for example the sample was knit with bulbe bizarre sock extrafine 400 m 437 yds / 100 g **needles ** stockinette cuff heel & toe 2 25 mm us 1 circular needles or dpns colourwork 2 75 mm us 2 circular needles or dpns or sizes required to get gauge **gauge ** 32 sts x 37 rnds per 10 cm 4 with colourwork needles in stranded knitting and stockinette after blocking **size ** the pattern is written for a 56 64 / 72 / 80 stitch count and increases for the colourwork section 19 5 22 / 24 5 / 27 cm 19 5 22 / 24 5 / 27 finished circumference measure your foot at its widest point under the toes and choose the size closest to this measurement or slightly smaller **notions ** stitch markers tapestry needle and scissors row counter recommended **techniques used ** socks are knit cuff down german twisted cast-on 2/2 ribbed cuff simple increases and decreases stranded knitting with 2 colours per round and few floats to catch german short row heel rounded toe grafting pattern includes charted instructions charts contrast show a light background mc and dark patterns cc ------------------------------------------------------------------- la collection cecilia contient 5 patrons un tour de cou une écharpe un bonnet des mitaines et des chaussettes elle propose des motifs de jacquard au choix pour des projets personnalisés avec des dessins floraux géométriques et figuratifs les modèles ont été créé en collaboration avec la teinturière bulbe bizarre la laine ayant été offerte pour les prototypes **laine ** vous aurez besoin d au moins deux couleurs de laine fingering avec le métrage suivant jacquard seulement sur la jambe total cp 220 250 / 270 / 305 m total cc 54 60 / 67 / 76 m jacquard sur toute la chaussette total cp 180 205 / 220 / 250 m total cc 105 117 / 125 / 132 m vous pouvez diviser ces métrages et
